"'Control'" is a song that Poe contributed to the Sony PlayStation video game
[[Apocalypse (video game)|Apocalypse]]. The song was released as a promotional
single to stir up attention for the game. Poe also portrayed two characters in
the game, Plague and Mary Magdalene.

It appears on Poe's second full-length album [[Haunted (Poe album)|Haunted]].
